requestBody.description: Connect token request or registration details

serverTime.description: Server time in unix time in mili seconds.
Server time in unix time in mili seconds.

useBudget.description: Number of connections that can be created with the connect token

useSpend.description: Number of connections that have been created with the connect token

valid.description: Whether the connect token can be used or not

alias.description: Qiy Node alias, returned in connect tokens.

publicKey.description: Public key to be used to authenticate future requests.

connectionUrl.description: Connection url of the new connection with the Qiy Node

newUri.description: Connection url of the first connection with the Qiy Node

connectToken.description: Connection token url of the connect token that was used to create the connection

transportAuthentication.description: Also requires user authentication, see [Qiy Node Transport Authentication](https://github.com/qiyfoundation/Qiy-Scheme/blob/topic/oas/Qiy-Node/Qiy%20Node%20API.md#transport-authentication)
transportAuthentication.name: Authorization-node-QTN

userAuthentication.description: Also requires app authentication, see [Qiy Node User Authentication](https://github.com/qiyfoundation/Qiy-Scheme/blob/topic/oas/Qiy-Node/Qiy%20Node%20API.md#user-authentication)
userAuthentication.name: Authorization-node-QTN
